Typography

ITC Johnston is our core font. It is used for all printed marketing and product materials and for online display copy.

  1. Font
  2. Typographic scale

1. Font

We use ITC Johnston in two weights: light and medium.

Aa Aa Johnston ITC Light Medium
HTML injected here.

2. Typographic scale

Use the following scales for typography across different screen sizes. All spacing is based on our 6px baseline.

Desktop (over 1024px)

Font weightFont sizeLine heightMargins (top is always 0px)
Heading 1Medium48px60pxBottom 30px
Heading 2Medium36px48pxBottom 18px
Heading 3, 4, 5Medium21px30pxBottom 12px
Heading 6Medium18px24pxBottom 12px
Intro textLight28px36pxBottom 30px
ParagraphLight18px24pxBottom 30px
Small textLight16px24pxn/a
Navigation linkMedium18px24pxn/a
Text linkMedium18px24pxn/a
Text link smallLight16px24pxn/a
QuoteLight18px30px18px
Bulleted listLight18px36px30px
Numbered listLight18px36px30px

Tablet and mobile (up to 1024px)

Font weightFont sizeLine heightMargins (top is always 0px)
Heading 1Medium46px54pxBottom 30px
Heading 2Medium34px42pxBottom 18px
Heading 3, 4, 5Medium20px30pxBottom 12px
Heading 6Medium16px24pxBottom 12px
Intro textLight26px36pxBottom 30px
ParagraphLight16px24pxBottom 30px
Small textLight14px22pxn/a
Navigation linkMedium16px24pxn/a
Text linkMedium16px24pxn/a
Text link smallLight14px22pxn/a
QuoteLight16px24px18px
Bulleted listLight16px30px30px
Numbered listLight16px30px30px
